item.title: End of Year PhD seminars
item.author: Author
item.description: PhD End of Year seminar on Quantum Machine Learning Yesterday I took part in the End of Year seminars of PhD students at University of Pavia. For the end of my first year, I had to I talk about my research field, Quantum Machine Learning, introducing the state of the art, drawbacks and future possibilities. Here is my presentation, go check it out: presentation. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: Il Grande Macello
item.author: Author
item.description: Download article “Il Grande Macello”, by Stefano Mangini Il Grande Macello Few months ago, I decided to wrote a divulgation article on food choices and sustainability, explaining those reasons which motivated me to approach a full plant based diet. Unfortunately, the article was targeted to an Italian audience and it is then written in Italian, because you can already find great resources and information on the topic in english.

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Here I will try to publish interesting content about my research, thoughts and experiences! See you soon!
